question: You share a parking area with several neighbours and have recently started having problems.Write a letter to be copied to all neighbours that share the parking area. In that letter• explaining the problems• suggesting ways to help the situation• proposing a possible meeting
text: The intent of this letter is to address the increasing parking issues in our association. As we all know, their multiple vehicles in the community where most are two-wheelers which are difficult to park. Moreover, with the parking area provided per flat is relatively smaller to accommodate a car only. Firstly, there is an argument generally noticed among neighbours regarding the two-wheeler parking as after parking the car they are using another parking or the open areas. Here, I would suggest using the MHADA parking as it is in an open area with the semi-covered sheds, for ,this we only need permission from the builder and this will solve our problem to a great extent.

Additionally, I would like to call for a General association meeting at 11:00 am on this Sunday 26th June,22 to look for possible solutions for this issue. Please reply to the meet app association group regarding your availability for a meeting.
I hope all like proposal in that regards and give your feedback
